last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: After seeing a specialist, Kumiko and Kenichi decide not to have children. When she tells her parents, they demand to speak to her in-laws.

name: My Husband Won't Fit
original_name: 夫のちんぽが入らない
overview: Kumiko and Kenichi meet in college and build a happy marriage together. But over time, an unusual problem threatens to destroy their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Kumiko leaves boondocks to attend college, where she meets sophomore education major Kenichi. When they start dating, they discover a problem.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After two years together, Kenichi applies for a job in Yamanashi. After some fruitless research, Kumiko later finds a ray of hope for their issues.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Now happily married, Kumiko and Kenichi are both teachers. After four years, Kumiko is moved to a new school and assigned a supposedly difficult class.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Following her discovery about Kenichi's activities, Kumiko struggles in her job at school. Problem child Miyuki quickly senses her weakness.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Kumiko begins discussing her problems on a supportive online forum, but when she meets one of the commenters, he turns out to be a man.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Kenichi and Kumiko are living parallel lives, separately pursuing physical gratification. His bank balance shrinks as she falls deeper into despair.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: He's noticed Kumiko's increasing unhappiness, but even as he wonders where things went wrong, Kenichi finds himself unable to do anything about it.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After quitting her job, Kumiko falls into a funk. When she goes to her parents' house for a funeral, she has a strange dream about a curse.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Kenichi raises the possibility of using other methods of getting pregnant, but when Kumiko reveals her past sexual experiences, he walks out.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After seeing a specialist, Kumiko and Kenichi decide not to have children. When she tells her parents, they demand to speak to her in-laws.
